tweet: Work should create energy adn inspire not dul and numb the brain.Countdown to the big escape is on...
Not seriously - its just so mind numbingly quiet and the same, day in day out. This place lacks a soul I think!!
Distract me please!!  Its not that I have trouble getting motivated to come to my cubicle - its just once I'm here I want to slash my wrists
